title: Switchblade Sisters
actors: Joanne Nail,Robbie Lee,Asher Brauner,Chase Newhart,Monica Gayle,Marlene Clark,Kitty Bruce,Janice Karman,Don Stark,Don Marino,Helene Nelson,Bill Adler,Paul Lichtman,J.S. Johnson,Kate Murtagh,Bob Minor,Clint Young,Roy Engel,Georgia Lee
summary: A tough gang of teenage girls are looking for love and fighting for turf on the mean streets of the city! Bad girls to the core, these impossibly outrageous high school hoodlums go where they want ... and create mayhem wherever they go!
